promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic special serpent water-type pokemon wearing a sapphire crystal headband. It can be found in ocean-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, water or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sapphydrodra, a a gigantic special serpent water-type pokemon. It can be found in ocean-like environments It has the following abilities: Hydro Snipe. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "water" or "Sapphydrodra". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of water-type pokemon, serpent-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, teal and blue ambient lighting
generatedDescription: A colossal marine marvel, this aqua leviathan, Sapphydrodra, reigns over deep sea domains. With Hydro Snipe, it deftly hits prey from afar.
